articles.title: Ghostlore: In this made-in-Singapore video game, you get to fight hungry ghosts and pontianaks - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: We speak to Andrew Teo, the creator of Ghostlore, on what it took to make this love letter to Southeast Asian folklore.
articles.content: Ghostlore now boasts a procedurally generated world with detailed item and character customisation systems reminiscent of Diablo. The maps feature well-known landmarks like the Merlion and shophouses… [+1717 chars]

articles.title: Asia's 'track queen' of the 1980s Lydia de Vega dies after 4-year cancer battle - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Her time of 11.28 seconds in the 100m - clocked in 1987 - still stands as a SEA Games record.
